constituent: simplicity, bamboo, interval, gates, sun, day
koohiiStory1: [simplicity; brevity] The ししおどし is a bamboo device for scaring birds from the gates of your garden by clacking against a stone at regular intervals. Its design is simplicity itself. (Inspired by PepeSeco).
koohiiStory2: The simplicity of bamboo plant is in all its joints being at equal intervals.
